overview: Sharing is fun! Sharing is sexy! At least this is the way our hero sees things. A girlfriend is something to be shared and enjoyed. He has money, he is handsome, and he feels like sharing with his friends the lovely holes that his many generous girlfriends provide. Dedicated to cuckold lovers, with an awesome cast featuring Mira Sunset, Kitty Cat, Stacy Snake, Irina Bruni and Teena Dolly, see how a girlfriend in need is a girlfriend indeed.
title: Share My Girlfriend
